short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically correct occurences of Elizabeth line to Crossrail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't call Crossrail the Elizabeth line!

This extension changes all occurrences of (the) Elizabeth line to Crossrail.

Please note that this change occurs after the page completes loading.
